content: Titanium.UI.3DMatrix Titanium UI 3DMatrix The 2DMatrix is created by Titanium.UI.create2DMatrix.  The 2D Matrix is an object for holding values for an affine transformation matrix. A 2D matrix is used to rotate, scale, translate, or skew the objects in a three-dimensional space. A 3D matrix is represented by a 4 by 4 matrix. Because the forth column is always (0,0,1), the data structure contains values for only the first three columns. addEventListener fireEvent invert multiply removeEventListener rotate scale translate m11 m12 m13 m14 m21 m22 m23 m24 m31 m32 m33 m34 m41 m42 m43 m44

Titanium.Facebook Titanium Facebook The top level Facebook module.  The Facebook module is used for connecting your application with 
Facebook through Facebook Connect. login logout addEventListener createLoginButton execute fireEvent hasPermission isLoggedIn publishStream query removeEventListener requestPermission loggedIn permissions session userId

Titanium.UI Titanium UI The main Titanium.UI module.  The UI module is responsible for native user-interface components and interaction inside Titanium.  The goal of the UI module is to provide a native experience along with native performance by compiling Javascript code into their native counterparts as part of the build process.  addEventListener create3DMatrix fireEvent removeEventListener ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_IN ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_IN_OUT ANIMATION_CURVE_EASE_OUT ANIMATION_CURVE_LINEAR BLEND_MODE_CLEAR BLEND_MODE_COLOR BLEND_MODE_COLOR_BURN BLEND_MODE_COLOR_DODGE BLEND_MODE_COPY BLEND_MODE_DARKEN BLEND_MODE_DESTINATION_ATOP BLEND_MODE_DESTINATION_IN BLEND_MODE_DESTINATION_OUT BLEND_MODE_DESTINATION_OVER BLEND_MODE_DIFFERENCE BLEND_MODE_EXCLUSION BLEND_MODE_HARD_LIGHT BLEND_MODE_HUE BLEND_MODE_LIGHTEN BLEND_MODE_LUMINOSITY BLEND_MODE_MULTIPLY BLEND_MODE_NORMAL BLEND_MODE_OVERLAY BLEND_MODE_PLUS_DARKER BLEND_MODE_PLUS_LIGHTER BLEND_MODE_SATURATION BLEND_MODE_SCREEN BLEND_MODE_SOFT_LIGHT BLEND_MODE_SOURCE_ATOP BLEND_MODE_SOURCE_IN BLEND_MODE_SOURCE_OUT BLEND_MODE_XOR FACE_DOWN FACE_UP INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_BEZEL INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_LINE INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_NONE INPUT_BORDERSTYLE_ROUNDED INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ALWAYS INPUT_BUTTONMODE_NEVER INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONBLUR INPUT_BUTTONMODE_ONFOCUS KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_ALERT KEYBOARD_APPEARANCE_DEFAULT KEYBOARD_ASCII KEYBOARD_DEFAULT KEYBOARD_EMAIL KEYBOARD_NAMEPHONE_PAD KEYBOARD_NUMBERS_PUNCTUATION KEYBOARD_NUMBER_PAD KEYBOARD_PHONE_PAD KEYBOARD_URL LANDSCAPE_LEFT LANDSCAPE_RIGHT PICKER_TYPE_COUNT_DOWN_TIMER PICKER_TYPE_DATE PICKER_TYPE_DATE_AND_TIME PICKER_TYPE_PLAIN PICKER_TYPE_TIME PORTRAIT RETURNKEY_DEFAULT RETURNKEY_DONE RETURNKEY_EMERGENCY_CALL RETURNKEY_GO RETURNKEY_GOOGLE RETURNKEY_JOIN RETURNKEY_NEXT RETURNKEY_ROUTE RETURNKEY_SEARCH RETURNKEY_SEND RETURNKEY_YAHOO TEXT_ALIGNMENT_CENTER TEXT_ALIGNMENT_LEFT TEXT_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_ALL TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_NONE TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_SENTENCES TEXT_AUTOCAPITALIZATION_WORDS TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_BOTTOM TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_CENTER TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_TOP UNKNOWN UPSIDE_PORTRAIT

Titanium.XML.DOMDocument Titanium XML DOMDocument The DOMDocument returned from Titanium.XML.parseString. The result is an object that implementes the DOM Level 2 API.

Titanium.Analytics Titanium Analytics The top level Analytics module.  The Analytics module is used for transmitting developer-defined Analytics event for your application to the Appcelerator Analytics product. It can be used to augment additional context or application-specific information which can then be accessed during analysis using Analytics. addEvent addEventListener featureEvent fireEvent navEvent removeEventListener settingsEvent timedEvent userEvent Custom Feature Event

Titanium.UI.ScrollableView Titanium UI ScrollableView The Scrollable View provides a view that supports horizontal scrolling on one or more views in a gesture motion.  The Scrollable View also optionally supports a visual paging control to indicate the page that the view is visible. The Scrollable View is created by the method Titanium.UI.createScrollableView. click dblclick doubletap scroll singletap swipe touchcancel touchend touchmove touchstart twofingertap add addEventListener addView animate fireEvent hide remove removeEventListener removeView scrollToView show toImage anchorPoint backgroundColor backgroundImage borderColor borderRadius borderWidth bottom center currentPage height left maxZoomScale minZoomScale opacity pagingControlColor pagingControlHeight right showPagingControl size top touchEnabled transform views visible width zIndex Simple Scrollable View with 3 Views

Titanium.UI.WebView Titanium UI WebView The Web View allows you to open an HTML5 based view which can load either local or remote content. The content can be any valid web content such as HTML, PDF, SVG or other WebKit supported content types. The Web View is created by the method Titanium.UI.createWebView. beforeload click dblclick doubletap error load singletap swipe touchcancel touchend touchmove touchstart twofingertap add addEventListener animate canGoBack canGoForward evalJS fireEvent goBack goForward hide reload remove removeEventListener setBasicAuthentication show stopLoading toImage anchorPoint backgroundColor backgroundImage borderColor borderRadius borderWidth bottom center data height html left loading opacity right scalesPageToFit size top touchEnabled transform url visible width zIndex Basic Web View to external URL example

Titanium.UI.iPhone.ActivityIndicatorStyle Titanium UI iPhone ActivityIndicatorStyle A set of constants for the styles available for Titanium.UI.ActivityIndicator objects. BIG DARK PLAIN

Titanium.UI.Tab Titanium UI Tab A TabGroup Tab instance.  Each Tab instance maintains a stack of tab windows. Only one window within in the Tab can be visible at a time.  When a window is closed, either by the user or by code, the window is removed from the stack, make the previous window visible. The root tab window cannot be removed. The Tab Group is created by the method Titanium.UI.createTab. click dblclick doubletap singletap swipe touchcancel touchend touchmove touchstart twofingertap add addEventListener animate fireEvent hide remove removeEventListener show toImage anchorPoint backgroundColor backgroundImage badge borderColor borderRadius borderWidth bottom center height icon left opacity right size title top touchEnabled transform visible width window zIndex Simple Tab Example

The Image View is created by the method Titanium.UI.createImageView. change click dblclick doubletap load singletap start stop swipe touchcancel touchend touchmove touchstart twofingertap add addEventListener animate fireEvent hide pause remove removeEventListener show start stop toBlob toImage anchorPoint animating backgroundColor backgroundImage borderColor borderRadius borderWidth bottom center defaultImage duration height image images left opacity paused preventDefaultImage repeatCount reverse right size top touchEnabled transform url visible width zIndex Basic Image View

Titanium.UI.2DMatrix Titanium UI 2DMatrix The 2DMatrix is created by Titanium.UI.create2DMatrix.  The 2D Matrix is an object for holding values for an affine transformation matrix. A 2D matrix is used to rotate, scale, translate, or skew the objects in a two-dimensional space. A 2D matrix is represented by a 3 by 3 matrix. Because the third column is always (0,0,1), the data structure contains values for only the first two columns. addEventListener fireEvent invert multiply removeEventListener rotate scale translate a b c d tx ty
